Entries.default: "Smells like a rat king died in the wall."
"How... cozy."
"No one's here... perhaps that's for the best."
"Place smells this bad, if the owner ain't dead there's no excuse."
"Nobody be home? Fucking surprise, that. I wouldn't be living here neither."
"Smells like a pigpen... if all the hogs were dead."
"Tell me this is a costume party."
"Captain, may we go home? I feel unwell."
"I do hope we're not on the menu."
"Not the prettiest crowd..."
"What is this place?"
"Ain't nobody going to believe me bout this place."
"This is not right. Not by a long shot."
"I get to smash the next orb."
"Must we destroy everything we pass by?"
"Are you sure that was wise?"
"Now everybody can go back to being normal hungry monsters."
"For them, it's going to be like waking but the nightmare goes on..."
"Who could have seen this coming?"
"It's like that night in the Wild Mare all over again!"
"Well, this livened up."
"Think they still be serving? Ain't no shortage of stiff ones."
"Now their minds are shattered same as that orb."
"When you've heard one captain's tale you've heard them all. Right, captain?"
"I would miss our crew so terribly, I say..."
"Gotta remember that story for scaring little kids."
"Di verus, there is no end to the horrors of the Deadfire. Though we have no reason to seek such a place out, I am confident you will take me there eventually, Watcher."
"This old salt be reminding me of Remaro - were he twice as old and thrice as salty."
"That's taking impressment of sailors to a whole 'nother level."
